Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Dear all:
           now,i use Heritrix's recrawl to crawl some website who
ofter update its context.
           and i find Heritrix use last-modified,context
length,context-diggest(context md5) to determine whether the url update.but
some url have some advertising,for example:google advertising,and the url's
main context have not changed.but Heritrix will determine this url has
updated
           so i want to find some algorithm or some jar to resolve this
problem(use it to know the url's main context,not include adversiting or
some fram context).use main context md5 to replace all context md5.
          Thank you!

--0016361e83f8650d7a04972e13bd
